Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average velocity of the team

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the total severity of active blockers

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Maximize the total priority of features in the release

Name: minimize_sprint_effort_variance
Description: Minimize the variance between estimated and actual effort in a sprint

Name: maximize_worker_availability
Description: Maximize the total availability of workers

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the average satisfaction from sprint reviews

Name: minimize_task_blocked_time
Description: Minimize the time tasks spend in a blocked state

Name: maximize_skill_coverage
Description: Maximize the coverage of required skills in the team

Name: minimize_sprint_goal_failure
Description: Minimize the number of sprints where the goal was not achieved
